foreignData.flavorText: „Unbesiegbar ist auch nur ein Wort." —Gideon Jura
foreignData.name: Ausbooten
foreignData.text: Lege eine Kreatur deiner Wahl als zweite Karte von oben in die Bibliothek ihres Besitzers. Ihr Beherrscher erhält 3 Lebenspunkte dazu.

foreignData.name: Derrocar
foreignData.text: Pon la criatura objetivo en la biblioteca de su propietario segunda desde la parte superior. Su controlador gana 3 vidas.

foreignData.name: Évincement
foreignData.text: Mettez la créature ciblée dans la bibliothèque de son propriétaire en deuxième position à partir du dessus. Son contrôleur gagne 3 points de vie.

foreignData.name: Spodestare
foreignData.text: Metti una creatura bersaglio nel grimorio del suo proprietario come seconda carta. Il suo controllore guadagna 3 punti vita.

foreignData.flavorText: 「『無敵』など言葉遊びに過ぎん。」 ――ギデオン・ジュラ
foreignData.name: 失脚
foreignData.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とし、それをオーナーのライブラリーの一番上から２枚目に置く。 それのコントローラーは３点のライフを得る。

foreignData.flavorText: "'Invencível é apenas uma palavra." — Gideon Jura
foreignData.name: Ejetar
foreignData.text: Coloque a criatura alvo no topo do grimório de seu dono na segunda posição. Seu controlador ganha 3 pontos de vida.

foreignData.name: Вытеснение
foreignData.text: Положите целевое существо в библиотеку его владельца вторым сверху. Контролирующий его игрок получает 3 жизни.

foreignData.name: 撵走
foreignData.text: 将目标生物置于其拥有者的牌库顶数来第二张的位置。 其操控者获得3点生命。

name: Oust
originalText: Put target creature into its owner's library second from the top. Its controller gains 3 life.

rulings.text: If the targeted creature’s owner has one or more cards in their library, that creature is put into that library directly under the top card.
If the targeted creature’s owner has no cards left in their library, that creature is put into that library as the only card there.
If the targeted creature is a token, it will cease to exist after it’s put into its owner’s library.
Note that the creature’s controller, not its owner, is the one who gains life.
If the targeted creature is an illegal target by the time Oust resolves, the spell doesn’t resolve. No one gains life.

text: Put target creature into its owner's library second from the top. Its controller gains 3 life.
